summary: Changes the Skeleton footsteps sound to that of a trumpet note.
descriptionHtml:
Tired of Mr. Bones always clanking around? This mod lets him creep around/chase and brutally kill you/get blown apart in style.

Brand Spankin' New Alternate Sound:
[youtube]sivXku9qrNY[/youtube]

Original Sound:
[youtube]dqn4qAdjNGc[/youtube]

[b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b]
Drag 'n drop to the data folder, baby.
Or use a mod manager of your choosing.

[u][b]COMPATIBILITY
[/b][/u]Should be compatible with just about everything unless a mod also edits the skeleton footstep sound entries in the CK (unlikely).
Should work with Dawnguard added skeletons. (If it doesn't let me know!)
Should [i]probably[/i] also work with mod added skeletons.Â 

Let me know about any bugs or issues.
author: jurr

files.name: Skeleton Trumpet Feet- Doot Doot Edition
